Tools

projects->Tools

The DLF Assessment Interest Group Metadata Working Group (DLF AIG MWG) collects information about–and enhances access to–various metadata assessment tools to support professionals who analyze, collect, create, enhance, manipulate, and/or validate various kinds of metadata.

Information about these tools is published in a regularly updated GitHub wiki.

To review our list of metadata assessment tools, visit the DLF AIG MWG Tools wiki!

To suggest a tool be added to the wiki, please fill out our project proposal form!

To recommend a change to our website or tool wiki, please fill out our website change request form!
